Our stay at Mae's place was fabulous! Mae was great communicating with us from the beginning and through our stay. The rental is attached to her house but it has its' own entry and key pad so we didn't see our hostess at all during our stay. It was easy to find and in a nice quiet neighborhood just a couple blocks up the hill from town. The rental is spacious and well appointed with everything we needed. The bed was so comfortable and the bathroom is very large also. There is a nice sitting area out front for morning coffee and the entire unit is bright and airy! We would definitely stay there again when we come to Sonora!

What a great airbnb! It is a cute apartment with a comfortable bed, a great outdoor patio to enjoy the mornings and evenings and very well located and within walking distance of town. Mae is a fantastic host -- communicative and makes sure that her guests are taken care of. I will be staying here the next time I come to Sonora and recommend it to others!

What a fabulous place! Just a quick walk through the historic neighborhood to reach Main Street with all its restaurant and shop offerings. The studio was spacious, light, clean and really comfortable. Stylishly curated with a mid-century vibe. We loved mixing up fancy cocktails at the wet bar, and then basking in the hot tub on the private patio. Place was very well provisioned and the organic local coffee provided was a nice touch. It was so lovely to enjoy morning coffee on the patio! Mae (the host) was super friendly and easy to communicate with. I wish I could have stayed longer, but I will definitely stay here again during my next visit to Sonora. Highly, highly recommend!

Wonderful place to stay! Beautiful views from the patio. Very clean and tidy with everything you need! Mae was a terrific host and made sure we had everything we needed. Looking forward to visiting again.

Mae's place was a great stay for us. 5 stars all around. She was available for any questions we had, which were not many. Mae has done a beautiful job in creating a cozy rental with quality furnishings. The bed was terrific, too! Located in a beautiful, quiet hillside neighborhood, it is an ideal location. A short 8 minute walk to town.
We give the highest recommendation for Mae's Airbnb. She is the best host we've had. Thank you, Mae, for making our stay so wonderful.
Everything about your place was absolutely perfect.

This unit is so sweet, so cozy, and awesome. The space is bright and airy. Fear not, there are blinds on the door and excellent blackout curtains over the windows. The murphy bed is COMFY and the linens/blankets are PERFECT. The bar is a cute add with microwave, coffee maker, kettle and sink. The giant bathroom with vanity really wowed my wife. The fireplace is adorable and VERY functional. The outdoor space is adorable and Mae is continually improving that space.
The location is a short walk to downtown. Which, after having a drink or two and a big great meal at any of the eateries, is perfect. A 10 minute stroll after eating is excellent. Also, since there is the carport for parking, you don't have fight with traffic or search for parking! Always always a plus.
Can't say enough good things. It is a super quiet location in a super cute town.

Mae's place is situated in a quiet neighborhood within a short walk to Sonora's downtown. In the morning, there is great natural light that comes onto the patio and into the apartment. The space is handsomely decorated and well-provisioned, and has a very nice climate control system. The layout of the apartment is great and the space ample and comfortable. On our second night, we ordered take-out and spent a cozy evening by the fire reading some of the interesting books on local history and geology available in the book case. Mae was a thoughtful hostess and good communicator. She provided local coffee to brew and the flowering quince branch in a vase was a beautiful touch of spring. We recommend Mae's rental highly.

Very nice place! 22 brick steps from street to entrance and then, voila, a large patio, covered entrance leading into a spacious studio. Tons of natural light coming through the many windows looking out over cute yard full of morning glories, lavender and rosemary. Top notch bedding, large bar and kitchenette with swivel seating so the room can be enjoyed panorama style for T.V. viewing or socializing. Walking distance to downtown Sonora with its many shops and variety of dining options. Absolutely love this place. Friendly, responsive host.

The shower was clogged and had standing water. The bathroom sink was also clogged and was inoperable. The house was dusty. The bathroom fan was disgusting and extremely dirty. The backsplash tiles in the kitchen are falling off the walls. The bed was so uncomfortable, one of us got lucky and slept on the couch. We ended up leaving early and renting another local property.
